articles.author: Michael Gowler
articles.title: Liverpool transfer round-up: Reds decide Diaz stance as offers come in for Origi - The Mirror
articles.description: Liverpool are set for a busy January transfer window, with talk of forward cover being touted and a number of fringe players attracting interest from clubs across Europe
articles.content: While Liverpool's Covid-enforced postponement of their League Cup semi-final first-leg against Arsenal means there won't be any action for the Reds on the pitch this week, there's plenty happening of… [+4558 chars]

articles.title: Russian rocket from failed launch to make uncontrolled re-entry into earth's atmosphere - The Streetjournal
articles.description: Part of a failed Russian rocket launch is set to make an uncontrolled re-entry back to Earth, the European Space Agency has announced.....
articles.content:
Part of a failed Russian rocket launch is set to make an uncontrolled re-entry back to Earth, the European Space Agency has announced.
The Russian rocket, Angara-A5 was launched from Russia on Decem… [+1093 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Hong Kong bans flights as Omicron surges around globe - New Straits Times
articles.description: HONG KONG: Asian financial hub Hong Kong banned flights from eight nations on Wednesday as part of strict new virus curbs, with Omicron outbreaks spiralling out of control from Europe to the United States.
